Original: 託長輩的福，訂位後因為臨時有事無法出席，所以就代替他出席。主廚精心製作的頂級牛肉麵，用料實在，湯頭十分清甜細緻，膠質豐富但不油膩，牛腱和牛筋都很柔嫩但不軟爛，還有甜美的胡蘿蔔可以轉換一下口味。手工麵條彈牙有嚼勁，但份量不小，若把小菜吃完，可能吃不下一整碗麵，兩個都吃完就喝不下酒，真的太為難了😆😆😆 …
EN: The blessing of the elder, because there was something temporarily unable to attend after the reservation, he attended him.The top -grade beef noodles made by the chef are really sweet and delicate. The soup is very sweet and delicate. The glue is rich but not greasy. The beef tendon and beef tendon are very tender but not soft. There are also sweet carrots to convert the taste.The handmade noodles are chewy, but the portion is not small. If you eat the side dishes, you may not be able to eat a whole bowl noodles.

Original:
不定期出現的厲害牛肉麵，可以選瓶好酒邊喝紅酒邊品嚐，這次幸運吃到Andy老闆親自料理最終回，以後就是傳給徒弟來服務囉。
⠀
湯頭有豐富膠質和滿滿茄紅素，由五個部位的牛骨再加入三種蕃茄《牛番茄、黑柿蕃茄、蜜紅聖女番茄》熬製，非常濃郁卻不會搶了牛肉原有的味道，選用美國安格斯山黑牛牛腱心，肉質軟嫩，接近入口即化。
EN:
The terrible beef noodles that appear on time can choose a bottle and drink red wine to taste. This time, I was lucky enough to eat the Andy boss personally cooking and finally returned.
⠀
The soup is rich in glue and full tortoise. The beef bones of five parts are added with three types of tomatoes "Cow, tomato, black persimmon tomato, honey red virgin tomato". Some taste, choose the black beef tendon heart of Angus, the United States, the meat is soft and tender, and it is close to the entrance.

Original: 本次有機會吃到特製炸醬麵套餐，真的是非常好的一餐啊一言難盡，很期待未來的各式餐點。
EN: I have the opportunity to have a special fried noodle package this time. It is really a very good meal.

Original: 在學弟的預約下，首次嚐了生平最貴要預約的牛肉麵，不要只看照片中簡簡單單的青菜和幾片肉，光一碗麵中就有牛肉、牛筋和牛腩，老闆燉得非常的入味和黏牙，而湯頭不似一般外面坊間吃到的那種死鹹，反而多了濃濃的膠質肉味，手工麵條更是嫩而不爛，老闆也貼心地準備三個配料，讓我們先吃完原味後，依照自己的需要加蔥、加辣椒等，一碗牛肉麵竟讓我前後享受到不同的三種味覺享受，如果當天沒有騎車或開車的話，真想讓人再配一杯老闆推薦的紅酒，相信這碗牛肉麵吃下來，它的味覺豐富性更會不一樣。只能說老闆讓這個牛肉麵提升到另一個層次!
EN: Under the appointment of the schoolmate, for the first time, I tasted the beef noodles that I want to make up the most. The taste and sticky teeth, and the soup is not like the dead salty that is usually eaten outside, but it has a strong glue meat flavor, and the handmade noodles are tender and not bad. The boss also prepares three ingredients. After let's eat the original flavor, add green onions, pepper, etc., a bowl of beef noodles can enjoy different three flavors and enjoyment. If there is no cycling or driving that day With a glass of red wine recommended by the boss, I believe that this bowl of beef noodles will be more rich in taste.It can only be said that the boss raises this beef noodle to another level!
